snippet: The agency said that a New Jersey-based fund, Yorkville Advisors, lied to its investors about its performance and asset values in order to earn higher fees.
abstract: The agency said that a New Jersey-based fund, Yorkville Advisors, lied to its investors about its performance and asset values in order to earn higher fees.

headline.main: S.E.C. Accuses Hedge Fund of Lying About Performance
